name: Dapper - Siempre Rosado - Robusto
additionalNotes: Spanish for "Always"... and so perfectly describing our committment to continually crafting world-class cigars. Siempre Rosado is covered in a Ecuadorian Rosado wrapper complimented by both sweet & earthy tobaccos from the Jamastran and Connecticut River Valleys. In combination with our classic blends of rich filler tobaccos from U.S & Nicaragua the Siempre Rosado cigar provides a truly sophisticated smoking experience.
